titleStmt.title: The contempte of the vvorld, and the vanitie thereof, written by the reuerent F. Diego de Stella, of the order of S. Fr. deuided into three bookes, and of late translated out of Italian into Englishe, vvith conuenient tables in the end of the booke
Vanidad del mundo. English
titleStmt.author: Estella, Diego de, 1524-1578.
Cotton, George.

notesStmt.note: Translation of: La vanidad del mundo.
Translator's dedication signed: G.C., i.e. George Cotton.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
